医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现血栓中存在微塑料，导致心脏病和中风的风险增加EBioMedicine 的一项研究揭示了主要血管血栓中显着的微塑料浓度，将微塑料水平与血栓事件风险和严重程度的增加联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Study-finds-micro Plastics-in-blood-clots-linking-them-to-higher-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Study-finds-micro Plastics-in-blood-clots-linking-them-to-higher-risk-of-heart-attacks-and-中风.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=296dbcbe-2f22-4ab7-88b5-01fd1f2a363a Wed, 22 May 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Study finds microplastics in blood clots, linking them to higher risk of heart attacks and strokes
经常使用鱼油补充剂会增加健康人患心脏病的风险一项研究的结果表明，经常使用鱼油补充剂可能会增加而不是减少心血管健康状况良好的人首次患心脏病和中风的风险，但可能会减缓现有心血管健康状况不佳的进展并降低死亡风险。大型长期研究，发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Medicine 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Regular-use-of-fish-oil-supplements-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-in-healthy-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Regular-use-of-fish-oil-supplements-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-in-healthy-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bb02c56-713f-4c12-ad17-d29b06dbde44 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:57:03 -0400 Regular use of fish oil supplements linked to increased heart disease risk in healthy individuals
研究表明推荐的哮喘智能吸入器疗法采用率较低根据 ATS 2024 国际会议上发表的研究，只有 14.5% 的中度或重度哮喘成年患者接受了推荐的 SMART 组合吸入器方案，超过 40% 的学术肺部和过敏临床医生尚未采用这种最佳疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-reveals-low-adoption-of-recommished-smart-inhaler-therapy-for-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-reveals-low-adoption-of-recommended-smart-inhaler-therapy-for-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b6b266e-2e42-4c39-9df2-3ab80c4c076f Tue, 21 May 2024 23:51:26 -0400 Study reveals low adoption of recommended smart inhaler therapy for asthma
定制抗体-药物偶联物为侵袭性乳腺癌带来希望科学家利用乳腺癌细胞的弱点，将肿瘤选择性抗体与细胞杀伤药物结合起来，摧毁难以治疗的肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Tailored-antibody-drug-conjugate-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Tailored-antibody-drug-conjugate-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d38d43a9-16f5-4fed-aadd-9b677bcaed38 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:48:57 -0400 Tailored antibody-drug conjugate offers hope for aggressive breast cancer
研究将尿液中较高的微塑料水平与子宫内膜异位症风险联系起来生态毒理学和环境安全的一项研究发现，与健康人相比，子宫内膜异位症患者的尿液样本中微塑料含量更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-links-higher-microplas-levels-in-urine-to-endometriosis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-links-higher-microplas-levels-in-urine-to-endometriosis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61c9d38d-5e79-4dcb-af4d-80dcfa55e796 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Study links higher microplastic levels in urine to endometriosis risk
全球研究凸显主要健康风险：空气污染和高血压位居榜首《柳叶刀》的一项综合研究揭示了 88 种风险因素对全球健康的影响，强调了空气污染和高血压的重大负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Global-study-highlights-major-health-risks-air-pollution-and-high-blood-Pressure-top-the-list.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Global-study-highlights-major-health-risks-air-pollution-and-high-blood-Pressure-top-the-list.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4428d2ab-2106-451e-93c6-c4c19f67feef Tue, 21 May 2024 23:37:00 -0400 Global study highlights major health risks: air pollution and high blood pressure top the list
新模型预测急性肾损伤后肾功能恢复辛辛那提大学医学院的研究人员创建了一个评分模型，该模型使用关键的健康指标来准确预测因急性肾损伤 (AKI) 导致肾衰竭的患者的康复情况，急性肾损伤 (AKI) 发生在肾脏停止正常工作时，范围可以从轻微到严重。肾功能丧失直至完全衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/New-model-predicts-kidney-function-recovery-after-acute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/New-model-predicts-kidney-function-recovery-after-acute-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bea31dac-0b86-4f3c-ab56-9e56e083ecd6 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:35:42 -0400 New model predicts kidney function recovery after acute kidney injury
克利夫兰诊所的研究揭示了黑色素瘤患者的显着遗传倾向当谈到皮肤癌时，大多数人会想到关于晒伤和晒黑床的警告。 “癌症基因”或遗传风险的想法仅限于乳腺癌或结肠癌等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Cleveland-Clinic-study-reveals-significant-genic-predisposition-in-melanoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Cleveland-Clinic-study-reveals-significant-genic-predisposition-in-melanoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26214132-5335-45d1-af6a-f771552fa627 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:28:10 -0400 Cleveland Clinic study reveals significant genetic predisposition in melanoma patients
研究发现，多吃土豆可以降低患心脏病和过早死亡的风险挪威的一项研究发现，较高的马铃薯消费量可适度降低成年人全因疾病和心血管疾病死亡率的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Eating-more-potatoes-may-lower-your-risk-of-heart-disease-and-early-death-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Eating-more-potatoes-may-lower-your-risk-of-heart-disease-and-early-death-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0212ec33-1a11-42f4-a382-ac75939a3002 Tue, 21 May 2024 23:24:00 -0400 Eating more potatoes may lower your risk of heart disease and early death, study finds
研究发现，超过五分之一的加拿大人无法获得初级保健CMAJ 的最新研究发现，加拿大有超过五分之一的成年人无法获得初级保健，而且在获得初级保健方面存在巨大的地区差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/More-than-1-in-5-Canadians-lack-access-to-primary-care-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/More-than-1-in-5-Canadians-lack-access-to-primary-care-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc190e36-47f6-4331-9d59-f20758234a60 Tue, 21 May 2024 15:17:20 -0400 More than 1 in 5 Canadians lack access to primary care, research finds
